definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: do, make (poet. for [[עָשָׂה]]) (NH [[פּוֹעֵל]] workman, cf. J Aram.; Ph. [[פעל]] = BH (oft.); Ar. fa9ala id.; OAram.; [[פעל]]; Syr. In der. spec. and deriv.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3ms. De 32:27 +, [[פָ֫עַל אֵל]] Nu 23:23, 2 ms. [[פָּעַלְתָּ]] Ex 15:17 +, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִפְעַל]] Job 22:17 +; 2 ms. [[תִּפְעָל־]] Job 35:6, etc.; Inf. Cstr. [[לְפָעְָלָם]] Job 37:12 (v. infr.); Pt. act. [[פּׂעֵל]] Ps 15:2+, pl. cstr. [[פּׂעֲלֵי]] Ps 5:6 +, etc.;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of God, c. acc. (abstr.) Nu 23:23, De 32:27, Job 33:29, [[יְשׁוּעוֹת]] Ps 74:12; + [[ל]] pers. Ps 31:20, Ps 68:29, Is 26:12, Job 22:17; c. acc. cogn. [[פּׂעַל]] Ps 44:2, Hb Hab 1:5; acc.om. Is 43:13, cf. Is 41:4.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of men, c. acc. Ps 11:3, Job 11:8, + [[ל]] pers. (God) Job 7:20, + [[ב]] pers. (God) Job 35:6; esp. of doing evil, [[שָָׁקֶר]] Ho 7:1, [[עָוֶל]] Job 34:32, [[עַוְלָה]] Job 36:23, Ps 58:3, Ps 119:3, [[אָוֶן]] Pr 30:20, esp. [[פּׂעֲלֵי אָוֶן]] Ho 6:8, Is 31:2, Job 31:3, Job 34:8, Job 34:22, Ps 5:6 + 15 t. Psalm, Pr Pr 10:29, Pr 21:15, [[פּׂעֲלֵי רָע]] Mic 2:1; rarely of doing right, c. acc. [[מִשְׁפָּטוֹ]] Zep 2:3, [[חֶדֶק]] Ps 15:2.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of God, c. acc. concr. Ex 15:17; + [[ל]] rei Pr 16:4, [[ל]] of 2nd obj. Ps 7:16; [[פּׂעֲלִי]] Job 36:3 my Maker.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of man, c. acc. concr. Is 44:12, Is 44:15; acc. om. Is 44:12, Ps 7:16.—Is 1:31 v. [[פּׂעַל]].
